New Records: Sherfane Rutherford scored 74 off 82 balls for the West Indies
Wanindu Hasaranga dismissed Brandon King and Alick Athanaze with key wickets for Sri Lanka
Jeffrey Vandersay dismissed Shai Hope lbw for Sri Lanka
Key Match Events: Sherfane Rutherford formed an 85-run partnership with Roston Chase for the West Indies
Rain disrupted play, leading to a revised target for Sri Lanka
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka were set the target of 232 after rain halted the West Indies innings
Pathum Nissanka was ruled out due to injury and replaced by debutant Nishan Madushka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 37 overs
Sri Lanka won their first T20 series over the West Indies
